creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: snow-capped mountain peak with jagged top; blue and white; pinkish-grey sky; purple mountain peaks in foreground
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

bottom margin right of center, in pencil: [To Ulrick Pietzner]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LLC below image, in grey: [From Katsuragi-yama]; LRC below iamge, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]; LRC, in black: [吉田遠志] {Yoshida Tōshi}; LRC, in red: [遠志] {Tōshi}; left margin, in pencil: [?????　かつらぎ山より] {1983nen saku, Katsuragiyama ori}
title: From Katsuragi-yama
